snippet: Ali Larijani, the speaker of Parliament and a rival of President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, was set to speak at the shrine to commemorate the 34th anniversary of the Islamic revolution.
abstract: Ali Larijani, speaker of Iran's Parliament and open rival of Pres Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, is pelted with shoes and stones at shrine in Qom, forcing him to cancel speech there; episode occurs less than week after high-profile clash between two men in which Pres Ahmadinejad released video of what he said were secret business dealings involving Larijani's family member.
lead_paragraph: Ali Larijani, the speaker of Parliament and a rival of President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, was set to speak at the shrine to commemorate the 34th anniversary of the Islamic revolution.

headline.seo: Iranian Politician Pelted With Shoes at Shrine
headline.main: Politician Is Pelted With Shoes at Iran Shrine
headline.print_headline: Politician Is Pelted With Shoes At Iran Shrine
